The Approach

Not a validator that checks code after the fact‚Äîa methodology that guides agents to write better code from the start.

Without Invar

  • No specification ‚Äî Agent guesses intent, misses edge cases
  • No feedback loop ‚Äî Errors accumulate undetected
  • No workflow ‚Äî Jumps to implementation, skips validation
  • No separation ‚Äî I/O mixed with logic, untestable

With Invar

  • Contracts as spec ‚Äî @pre/@post define exact boundaries
  • Multi-layer verification ‚Äî Static + doctest + property + symbolic
  • USBV workflow ‚Äî Understand ‚Üí Specify ‚Üí Build ‚Üí Validate
  • Core/Shell split ‚Äî Pure logic isolated, 100% testable

The key insight: process determines quality. When agents follow proven engineering practices, they produce code that meets specifications‚Äîverified automatically.

Agent workflow with Invar guidance

@post(lambda result: result >= principal)

‚îÅ‚îÅ /develop ‚Üí VALIDATE (4/4) ‚îÅ‚îÅ

One command to set up your project

Interactive mode ‚Äî select your agent. Add pip install invar-runtime for runtime contracts.
